company.name: Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University

profile_positions.company: Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description:
(Sensor fusion for localization)
o Implementing a wheel encoders odometry by using a bicycle model.
o Designing and implementing an adaptive covariance estimation method for proprioceptive sensors using an exteroceptive sensor.
o Multi-Sensor fusion by implementing different probabilistic filters (Extended Kalman, Unscented Kalman and H-infinity) for localization of an autonomous golf cart using odometries (encoders odometry, visual odometry, Lidar odometry and gps odometry) and comparing their results.
o Building a generic Multi-Sensor fusion package using ROS that fuses any number of sensors by one of the filters mentioned above
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Team member in a 9-member team working on designing an automated guided vehicle for LEONI wire Inc. (Graduation Project)
Implementing a localization algorithm using kalman filter as well as designing and implementing the control algorithm of the vehicle.
Building a Complete model of the vehicle on MATLAB Simulink and implementing the localization and control algorithm on it.
profile_positions.title: Team member (Graduation Project)

profile_positions.description: Working on Automating an End of Line in the FemCare department production line. The project was designing an automatic machine to be responsible for the central packing process.
profile_positions.title: Intern at FemCare Department
